subtopic.sub_topic_name: The period of rule of the Rightly Guided Caliphs and their importance as leaders

learning_objectives.description: The main events of the rule of the four Caliphs.
Their policies in maintaining and expanding the state.
Their approaches to leading the community.
Their significance as examples of leadership.
The importance of their rule as models for government today.
Their importance as examples for Muslim communities in their relations with other states.
